# hw04pChop18

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The package consists of two functions. Function 1 finds the sum of a vector of three values up to the nth term.Function 2 graphs the output of function 1 against the nth value.

## Installation

This package is only available by permission of the author (name: Christopher Hopkins, git id: Chop18) at:

``` r
install.packages("hw04pChop18")
```
